Event: You notice a kid getting bullied.
Good1: You beat up the bullies!
Good2: The kid got away but you got beaten up.

Event: A hacker threatens to leak company data unless paid.
Good1: You traced and stopped the hacker!
Good2: The data leaked but authorities were notified.

Event: You find a wallet with $500 on the street.
Good1: The owner rewards you generously!
Good2: You returned it but got nothing.

Event: A neighbor's house is on fire.
Good1: You saved a family with first aid skills!
Good2: You helped but inhaled smoke.
Evil1: You got viral fame but people died.

Event: Your friend asks you to help cheat on an exam.
Good1: You tutored them instead and they passed!
Good2: You refused but they failed anyway.

Event: A corporation is dumping waste illegally.
Evil: Accept a bribe to stay quiet.
Good1: Your evidence led to prosecution!
Good2: You exposed them but faced lawsuits.

Event: You witness a hit-and-run accident.
Good: Chase the driver and call police.
Good1: Your driving skills helped catch them!
Good2: You tried but lost them.

Event: A startup offers you equity to join.
Good1: Your business sense got you great terms!
Good2: You joined but got bad equity.

Event: Someone is spreading rumors about you online.
Good: Address it with facts and grace.
Good1: Your communication skills cleared everything!
Good2: You tried but it escalated.

Event: A stray dog approaches you injured.
Good1: Your volunteering connections helped you adopt it!
Good2: You spent $800 on vet bills.

Event: You discover your app has a security vulnerability.
Good: Fix it and notify users immediately.
Good1: Your coding skills fixed it in hours!
Good2: You fixed it but users were already hacked.

Event: A protest blocks your route to work.
Good1: Your public speaking inspired others!
Good2: You joined but got arrested.

Event: You find evidence your boss is embezzling.
Good1: Your law knowledge ensured conviction!
Good2: You reported but got fired.

Event: A child is choking in a restaurant.
Neutral: Yell for someone else to help.
Good1: Your medical training saved their life!
Good2: You tried but broke their rib.
Evil1: The child died while you filmed.

Event: Your artwork could win a competition.
Good1: Your art skills won first place!
Good2: You entered but came in last.

Event: You see someone being harassed on the subway.
Good1: Your martial arts training intimidated them!
Good2: You intervened but got punched.

Event: A company asks you to design a misleading ad.
Good1: Your design ethics impressed bigger clients!
Good2: You refused and lost the contract.
Evil1: You made the ad and got a bonus.

Event: You discover a math error in a tax system.
Good: Report it to help fix the issue.
Good1: Your math skills helped save millions!
Good2: You reported but no one believed you.

Event: A friend is showing signs of addiction.
Good1: Your experience with recovery programs helped them!
Good2: You tried but they pushed you away.

Event: Your engineering design has a dangerous flaw.
Evil: Ship it anyway to meet deadline.
Good1: Your engineering knowledge prevented disasters!
Good2: You delayed but saved lives.

Event: A student needs tutoring but can't afford it.
Good1: Your tutoring skills got them a scholarship!
Good2: You helped but they still failed.

Event: You witness election fraud.
Good1: Your evidence triggered an investigation!
Good2: You reported but were dismissed as paranoid.

Event: A coworker is being discriminated against.
Good1: Your debate skills got policy changed!
Good2: You stood up but both got fired.

Event: You can invest in either green energy or oil.
Evil: Invest in fossil fuels for profit.
Good1: Your investment knowledge made you rich ethically!
Good2: You invested but returns were slow.
Evil1: You made huge profits as climate worsened.

Event: A robot you programmed malfunctions dangerously.
Good: Shut it down and debug thoroughly.
Evil: Let it run to collect data.
Good1: Your robotics expertise fixed it perfectly!
Good2: You shut it down but couldn't fix it.
Evil1: It injured someone while you collected data.

Event: You see fake news going viral.
Good: Create a fact-check post with sources.
Evil: Share the fake news for engagement.
Good1: Your research skills exposed the truth!
Good2: You tried but got accused of lying.

Event: A photographer asks to use your photo commercially.
Evil: Demand excessive payment and threaten legal action.
Good1: Your networking led to a modeling contract!
Good2: You negotiated but got lowballed.

Event: You discover your yoga studio is a cult.
Good1: Your public awareness saved dozens!
Good2: You warned people but got sued.

Event: A music venue is underpaying artists.
Good1: Your music industry knowledge changed policy!
Good2: You advocated but got blacklisted.

Event: Your investment advice could save or ruin someone.
Good1: Your finance expertise made them wealthy!
Good2: You tried but they lost everything anyway.
Evil1: You got rich on their losses.
